A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not only is this a bad Star Wars movie\, this is just at bad movie.  Riddled with plot holes\, inconsistencies\, meaningless incoherent decisions and outright hostility toward star wars fans\, this movie flat out stinks.  Never in my life have I been more excited to see a movie like I was for this one and never in my life have I truly hated a movie like I did this one.  Its hard to even describe how many different ways in which it is truly terrible.
